name: disapprovingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you feel something or someone is bad or wrong: They looked at her disapprovingly. He folded his arms and shook his head disapprovingly. See
disapproving
More examplesFewer examplesShe glanced disapprovingly at the rows of bottles.He placed his hands on his hips disapprovingly."Oh, is that all?" he said, disapprovingly.
